name: Modern Gift Box
description: A small gift box with gorgeous velvet ribbons, very nice and graceful. It contains Big Cat Coin×50, Zeny ×500000, Eden Coin ×500, Mastela Fruit ×2, and greetings from fashionable people -Hope mainland adventurers all look pretty!

name: Momo Shoes
description: Magic rock powder and special gels are mixed to form such boots. Strong but lightweight.

name: Momo Shoes [1]
description: Magic rock powder and special gels are mixed to form such boots. Strong but lightweight.

name: Monkey Circlet
description: A Hair Band that fits a Yoyo perfectly.

name: Monocle
description: The glass, which can only cover one eye, is mostly regarded as a fashionable accessory in terms of its practicality.
effect: M.Atk ＋5%,For Refining ＋1, M.Atk ＋1% (upper limit of increases is 15%)

name: Monocle Blueprint
description: The glass, which can only cover one eye, is mostly regarded as a fashionable accessory in terms of its practicality.

name: Monster Bemstar Back Headwear
description: The plankton from the Crab Nebula uses hydrogen, nitrogen and helium as its energy source, and the pentagonal belly is also its mouth.

name: Monster Feed
description: Monster's favorite processed food that can restore 720-900 points of HP.

name: Monster Golza Backpack
description: Golza is a monster that survives volcanic magma, and this backpack must be very strong.
effect: Ignore MDef ＋5%,Ignore MDef ＋5% when reaching refining ＋6

name: Monster Gomora Back Headwear
description: Gomora is a survivor of ancient dinosaurs and a powerful underground monster Its emergence has prompted human thought-why do these monsters become fierce and brutal only after they come into contact with humans? Can monsters coexist peacefully with mankind? The answer, I am afraid, lies in the heart of man.
effect: Damage to Fire Monsters ＋10%,Fire damage taken -10%

name: Monster King Joe Back Headwear
description: The strength of robots is obvious to all. How far can we get through endless iterative evolution?

description: A gift pack for Monster Resistance. It may contain valuable items
